About

About My Digital Brain

A modern documentation template built with passion for knowledge sharing

What is Digital Brain?

Digital Brain is a comprehensive documentation template designed to help individuals and teams create beautiful, performant knowledge bases. Built with modern web technologies and accessibility in mind, it provides everything you need to organize and share your knowledge effectively.

Whether you're documenting a project, creating a personal knowledge base, or building comprehensive guides, Digital Brain offers the tools and structure to make your content shine.

Key Features

Performance First

Built with Astro for lightning-fast static site generation and optimal Core Web Vitals scores.

Powerful Search

Integrated Pagefind search with offline support and zero runtime dependencies.

Accessibility

WCAG 2.1 AA compliant with keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

Mobile Responsive

Beautiful, touch-friendly interface that works perfectly on all device sizes.

Modern Design

Clean, professional design with fluid typography and dark/light theme support.

Highly Customizable

Easy to customize with modern CSS architecture and component-based structure.

Technology Stack

Digital Brain is built with modern, proven technologies:

  • Astro 5.13 - Static site generator for optimal performance
  • MDX - Enhanced Markdown with component support
  • TypeScript - Type-safe development experience
  • Modern CSS - Fluid typography, CSS Grid, and custom properties
  • Pagefind - Fast, offline-capable search functionality
  • Font Awesome - Comprehensive icon library

Design Philosophy

Digital Brain follows several key design principles:

  • Content First - The design serves the content, not the other way around
  • Accessibility - Everyone should be able to access and use your documentation
  • Performance - Fast loading times and smooth interactions are essential
  • Simplicity - Clean, uncluttered interface that doesn't distract from content
  • Flexibility - Easy to customize and adapt to different use cases
